name: Void (itch) (Frozentape)
description:
A creepy audio-focused space experience made for Ludum Dare 47 by Duncan Gallagher and Nick Harbourne. We are both musicians/sound designers and wanted to create an abstract narrative experience using binaural audio.

Software used:

  • Unity
  • Blender
  • Wwise
  • Paulstretch
  • AMBEO Orbit
  • Mammut
  • Studio One

From Nick, who created all the sound design:

I processed the binaural audio by running it all through Ambeo Orbit, which allows one to place the sound in a 360-degree field. Layering up sounds like this creates a rich immersive world.

Made in Leith, Edinburgh :D
